Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.userInteractions.plants

Class PlantList

java.lang.Object
com.glamdring.greenZenith.userInteractions.plants.PlantList
public class PlantList extends Object
Provides a list that contains all the different plants that a user posseses.
Since:
0.1
Version:
1.1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • PlantList

      public PlantList(GZDBConnector gzdbc) throws InvalidPlantException
      Initializes all the plants from the database. in a lit and map.
      Parameters:
      gzdbc - A connection to the database to retrieve data correctly.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlantException - The connection to the database is not valid.

    • PlantList

      public PlantList(User owner) throws InvalidPlantException
      Initializes the list and map of this user's plants.
      Parameters:
      owner - The user to get all the plants from.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlantException - If the user does not provide a valid connection.

  • Method Details

    • getPlantList

      public ArrayList<Plant> getPlantList()
      The list with all the defined plants, either from the total or from a User.
      Returns:
      A listh with the data of each plant.

    • getPlantMap

      public LinkedHashMap<Integer,Plant> getPlantMap()
      The map with all the defined plants, either from the total or from a User.
      Returns:
      A map with the data of each plant and their IDs as keys.

    • getFromMap

      public Plant getFromMap(int id) throws InvalidPlantException
      Gets the plant data from the map that contains all the plants.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the plant to look for.
      Returns:
      The plant data.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlantException - If the ID does not resolve to any plant registry.

    • getFromList

      public Plant getFromList(int id) throws InvalidPlantException
      Gets the plant data from the list that contains all the plants.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the plant to look for.
      Returns:
      The plant data.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlantException - If the ID does not resolve to any plant registry.

    • add

      public void add(Plant plant)
      Add a new plant to the list and map of plants.
      Parameters:
      plant - The new plant to be added.

    • update

      public String update(int id, String newName, String newDescription, int newQuantity, LocalDate newPlantingDate, ArrayList<LocalTime> newSchedule, BufferedImage newPlantPicture) throws InvalidPlantException
      Updates all the data of a certain plant given by it's ID, any null or empy parameters are not considered for the update.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the plant to be updated.
      newName - The new name of this plant.
      newDescription - The new description of this plant.
      newQuantity - The new quantity of this type.
      newPlantingDate - The new date of this plant.
      newSchedule - A new list of times to be watered on.
      newPlantPicture - The new picture of this plant.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the successfulness and failure of the update.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlantException - If the ID does not resolve to any plant registry.

    • delete

      public void delete(int id) throws InvalidPlantException
      Delest a plant from the database and then the list and maps/
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the plant to be deleted.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlantException - If the ID does not resolve to any plant registry.
